incidents workbench for
customer relationship management incident workbench and Incident Workbench
section.para: The Incident Workbench enables you to monitor and take action on the full range of Incidents entered in your system. For ease of use, the rows in the workbench can be color-coded based on their status. To learn more about color-coding for the Incident Workbench, see:
When using the Incident Workbench, you are presented with the following options:

note.para: The system-defined default filter on the Incident Workbench shows Incidents assigned to the logged-in user having a status above "Resolved."

listitem.para: Enter a text pattern to locate keywords found in existing Incidents. The search will locate matching text strings found in the "Number," "Summary" and/or "Description" fields.
Display lists Incidents, using the specified parameters.
Select to automatically update the display every five minutes.
